name: Limb Loser
description:
The facility used to be the best in weapon technology. But one day their experiments got the best of them. Nowadays creators are captured victims, subjected to twisted experiments themselves, forced to battle and test out weapons until they have no limbs left. ..

Limb Loser was developed for Imagine 2019 by 3rd year students of the HKU, under the name Studio Red Roots. 

Studio Red Roots:

  • Bauke Hoekstra
  • Brechje de Klein
  • Charona Poeran
  • Christopher van der Kieft
  • Jurgen Felipa
  • Lennert Koppe
  • Sarah Steenhuis
  • Steven Vis

Red Roots also developed Cult Tag (downloadable on itch.io) and made three more (pervasive) games to test out during the festival.
